site_name: Former St John's Ambulance Hq Office Land Lying On The South Side Of
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of the original planning permission 2018/4011 dated 16/07/2019.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the following plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details:&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal;"><span style="font-variant-east-asian: normal;"><span style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="white-space: pre-wrap;">EX01, EX02, EX03, EX04, EX05, EX06, EX07, </span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-size: 11pt;"><span style="font-family:Arial"><span style="font-variant-numeric:normal"><span style="font-variant-east-asian:normal"><span style="vertical-align:baseline"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap">008_SBA-XX-XX-DR A-04011B, -/04012B, -/04013A, -/04014A, -/04015A,-/04016A, -/04018A, -/05001B, -/05002C, -/05003C, A-31001-1, A-31101-1, A-31102-1, Elevation A (Mildenhall Road), Elevation B (Millfields Road),</span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-size: 11pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal;"><span style="font-variant-east-asian: normal;"><span style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="white-space: pre-wrap;"> Servicing Management Plan, Construction Method Statement, Transport Statement, Tree Protection Plan, Archaeological Desk-Based Assessment, Planning Transport Design and Access Statement, Tree Survey Schedule, Daylight Sunlight &amp; Overshadowing Result ref 17-3595 dated Feb '19, File Note - Materials (External materials detailed). </span></span></span></span></span></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.<br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">No soil stacks, soil vent pipes, flues, ductwork or any other pipework shall be fixed to the (street) elevations of the building other than as shown on the drawings hereby approved.</span></p><p><br></p><p>REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the development is satisfactory, and preserves or enhances the character and appearance of the Mildenhall Road and Millfields Road.<br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved, the&nbsp;</span>cross-over to the north which will become redundant as a result of the development hereby approved shall be removed. The works shall only be undertaken by the Local Highway Authority (or by a third party appointed by the Local Highway Authority), and shall be undertaken at the expense of the Developer.</p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">REASON: To ensure that an adequate highway environment is provided.<br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">All non-Combined Heat and Power space and hot water fossil fuel (or equivalent hydrocarbon based fuel) boilers must achieve dry NOx emission levels equivalent to or less than 40 mg/kWh.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span>REASON: To protect air quality and human health by ensuring that the production of air pollutants are kept to a minimum during the course of building works and during the lifetime of the development.<br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38;">External materials used in the construction shall be in accordance with the details thus approved, and shall be maintained as such thereafter.</p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38;"><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the development is satisfactory, and preserves or enhances the character and appearance of the Mildenhall Road and Millfields Road.</p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">The construction of all windows and doors shall be carried out in accordance with the details thus approved, and shall be maintained as such thereafter.</p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the development is satisfactory, and preserves or enhances the character and appearance of the Mildenhall Road and Millfields Road.<br></p>

<p>The relevant part of works shall not commence until details, including elevation and cross section drawings at a scale of 1:20, of all fencing, walling and other boundary treatments have been submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing. The details shall include, inter alia, a dwarf wall to the front elevation with stretcher bond pattern screening above and within the site and the making good of the existing boundary wall. Such details as approved shall be implemented prior to the occupation of the development and shall thereafter be retained and maintained.</p><p>REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the&nbsp; development is satisfactory, and preserves or enhances the character and appearance of the Mildenhall Road and Millfields Road.</p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-f0cdb97d-7fff-05d4-3418-7aff797ddfec"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to first occupation the green roof shall be implemented in accordance with the details approved under 2020/3910 granted 18/03/2021 and shall be retained and maintained in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></span><br></p><p>REASON: To enhance the character and ecology of the development, to provide undisturbed refuges for wildlife, to promote sustainable urban drainage and to enhance the performance and efficiency of the proposed building.</p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-7c28f869-7fff-823b-ab4c-6b6e734837cb"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The development shall be implemented in accordance with the flood mitigation measures approved under 2020/3910 granted 18/03/2021 and shall thereafter be retained and maintained in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></span><br></p><p>REASON: In the interests of prevention of harm to human health and property as a result of flood.</p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved a minimum of two Swift nesting bricks and/or boxes shall be provided at or close to eaves level of the development hereby approved. The bricks/boxes shall be retained thereafter in perpetuity.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: in the interests of biodiversity.<br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to the first occupation of the new amalgamated unit hereby</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">approved, a minimum of two bat boxes shall be provided at or close to eaves&nbsp;</span>level of the development hereby approved. The boxes shall be retained thereafter in perpetuity.</p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">REASON: in the interests of biodiversity.<br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-687001f7-7fff-d982-017c-740ba03e3721"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-478aa273-7fff-07df-b9bc-c37920030abd"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to first occupation the </span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">waste management scheme </span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">shall be implemented in accordance with the details approved under 2020/3910 granted 18/03/2021 and shall be retained and maintained in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></span><br></p><p>REASON: In order to provide for adequate system.</p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-49863343-7fff-a954-d3dd-693f74236c41"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">All demolition and development shall be undertaken in accordance with the </span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">written scheme of investigation (WSI) as approved </span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">under 2020/3910 granted 18/03/2021.&nbsp; </span></span><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">REASON: To safeguard the archaeological interest of the site, which is within an Area of Archaeological Priority.<br></p>

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: A4D Storage and distribution to residential

description: Application to vary Condition 2 (Drawings) of planning permission ref. 2018/4011 for the demolition of the existing building and erection of a 4 storey building (plus basement) to accommodate eight residential flats. The variation is to revise the layouts of the units with changes to the exterior including changes in the size of the windows and changes to the balconies at the Mildenhall Road and Millfield Road elevations.
